body_html:
That looks like gcc is not getting the right PATH?

Why? for it looks good. no?

LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/nvidia/cudnn/8.0/lib:/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/nvidia/cuda/8.0/lib64:/trinity/shared/
apps/cv-ppc64le/gcc/5.4.0/lib64:/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/gcc/5.4.0/lib
PATH=/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/nvidia/cuda/8.0/bin:/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/gcc/5.4.0/bin:...::/usr/local/bin:/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin

So as in /usr/bin should be accessible.

Why? for it looks good. no?

apps/cv-ppc64le/gcc/5.4.0/lib64:/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/gcc/5.4.0/lib

So as in  /usr/bin should be accessible.
body:
> That looks like gcc is not getting the right PATH? 

Why? for it looks good. no?
```
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/nvidia/cudnn/8.0/lib:/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/nvidia/cuda/8.0/lib64:/trinity/shared/
apps/cv-ppc64le/gcc/5.4.0/lib64:/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/gcc/5.4.0/lib
PATH=/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/nvidia/cuda/8.0/bin:/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/gcc/5.4.0/bin:...::/usr/local/bin:/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin
```

So `as` in  `/usr/bin` should be accessible.
